Aprofita al màxim l’oci i la cultura de Barcelona amb l’aplicació de Time Out Barcelona per a dispositius Android. Barcelona és plena de possibilitats i ara les pots trobar al teu telèfon. L'aplicació de Time Out Barcelona et dóna accés a totes les activitats per fer a la ciutat: concerts, exposicions, pel•lícules, obres de teatre, festes, tallers... És l'agenda més completa de la ciutat actualitzada diàriament. Si estàs fora de casa com si planifiques des del sofà del menjador, és molt senzill organitzar els dies i les nits a Barcelona i convidar als teus amics. I a més és gratis! Característiques: Geolocalització. L'aplicació utilitza la teva posició geogràfica per recomanar-te les activitats i els llocs que tens més a prop en cada moment. Només cal prémer sobre 'Mapa'. Fàcil d'utilitzar. Tant si busques un concert com un restaurant, pots moure't pel contingut de l'aplicació seleccionant el tipus d'activitat, la zona i, fins i tot, el tipus de cuina. Crítiques independents. Els millors restaurants i bars de Barcelona escollits pels nostres especialistes. I abans d'anar al cine o al teatre, llegeix què diuen els nostres crítics. Actualitzacions regulars. Actualitzem diàriament les activitats i crítiques perquè puguis tenir la informació més completa de l'oci i la cultura de Barcelona. Si tens problemes amb l'aplicació, sisplau contacta'ns a http://community.timeout.com Make the most of leisure and culture of Barcelona Barcelona Time Out application for Android devices. Barcelona is full of possibilities and now you can find them on your phone. Application of Time Out Barcelona gives you access to all the activities to do in the city: concerts, exhibitions, films, plays, festivals, workshops ... It's the most complete calendar of the city updated daily. If you are outside the home if you plan from the living room sofa, it is easier to organize days and nights in Barcelona and invite your friends. And it's free! Features: Geo. The application uses your geographical position to recommend you the activities and sites you closer each time. Just click on 'Map'. Easy to use. Whether you want a concert as a restaurant, you can move the contents of the application by selecting the type of activity in the area and even the type of cuisine. Critics independent. The best restaurants and bars in Barcelona selected by our specialists. And before going to the cinema or the theater, read what our critics say. Regular updates. We update daily activities and critical for you to have the most complete leisure and culture of Barcelona. If you have any problems with the application, please contact us at http://community.timeout.com
release_text: Errors corregits - L'accés a Facebook i Twiiter ara funciona completament.

description: The app covers the following features. * Alphabetical order Kids will get familiarize in ordering both upper case and lower case alphabets/letters * Match upper and lower case alphabets * Puzzle * Spelling fun - The app provides more than 100 words * Missing letters You can choose the number of missing letters. The app provides three letter words,four letter words and five letter words. *Alphabet Patterns

Smart Feed Reader is a free, full-featured RSS, RDF and ATOM news reader. Manage your news automatically with Smart News Filtering, organize Feeds Groups by any criteria you choose – music, sport, movies and international news, rate the most interesting readings and share them with your friends and colleagues. Be Smart & Organized with Smart Feed Reader! Features: • Full support of RSS, RDF and ATOM feeds, import Google Reader feeds; • Offline reading of news; • Full-context search; • Widgets support; • Easy to manage feeds, personalized icons; • Customization of the feed update interval (global for all feeds and particular – for the selected feed); • Filtering stories by Author, Title, Content, Category for the best customization; • Automatic organizing feeds by categories; • Improved content sorting by Newer, Older, Unread, Read or Hide properties; • Highlighting of newly-added and updated news; • Automatic sorting news by Date: Today, Yesterday, Older; • Media Collection: easy to view pictures and play attached media; • Full-screen display of News (optional); • Easy sliding between news with a simple gesture; • Displaying news with a preview in the NewsList screen; • Star rating for the news; • Sharing content via E-Mail; • Support of landscape screen orientation. Smart News Filtering: Personalize your content with Smart News Filtering – powerful and innovative feature that helps you to filter and manage your news automatically by Author, Title, Content, Category, etc. Each filter is made up of search condition to match specific parameter and action to perform. With Smart News Filtering you can automate copying news into custom folders, marking news, rating or just deleting it. You can have as many smart filters as you need! Requirements: • Android 2.1 or later.
release_text: - Improved application stability, usability and performance.

description: Control a bouncing ball over many tile filled levels! The game features many different type of tile. Making it to the finish line gets tricky as the levels introduce harder and harder puzzles, timing, memory and reflex tests. The aim is to make it to the finish line... Don't Fall! ** This free game is ad. supported ** Scores and achievements with Google Play Game Services ** funqai.com/and_rebound.html In-app billing: ** Go Pro to: - Remove Ads - Reduce the score needed for an extra life through gaining achievements Control the ball by tilting your phone or dragging your finger around the play area. Don't drag too fast or the ball might not be able to keep up! As the ball lands make sure that it is over a tile. Different tiles will have different effects on the ball or level. On completing a level a star rating is awarded based on the score achieved on that level. An extra life is awarded every 2500 points. Practice Practice is a game mode where you are able to select any level that you have reached in the main game and practice playing on it. You will not advance to the next level when you complete a level and your score will not be recorded. However, the level star rating can be improved and achievements awarded.
release_text: - Local high score table is back, to compliment the Google Play leaderboards - Small bug fixes

description: Enjoy entertainment on the go! Watch live and on demand TV - any place on your smartphone. With the Rogers Anyplace TV app, you can: • Catch up on primetime TV shows • Stream live sports coverage • Watch full length movies • Keep the kids entertained with favourite shows from Treehouse, YTV and more • Rogers Digital TV customers – watch live and on demand content included in your cable subscription! Please note for current users, this app previously had a $5 monthly fee for live content, which is no longer available. You will no longer be charged this monthly fee. Instead, for both new and existing customers, usage will be deducted from your data plan. Without a data plan, standard data charges apply. You can view Live or On Demand content over your wireless network or via WiFi connection. You will need a My Rogers profile to get access. Don't have a My Rogers profile? Go to My Rogers at www.rogers.com/myrogers to create one. Your cable and/or wireless account needs to be tied to your My Rogers profile to get access to all your favourite TV shows, live sports, and more. Once you log in, live and on demand programming will be based on your Rogers cable package. On your smartphone, for our Live TV content only, you must connect to the Rogers wireless network first, before switching over to WiFi. This network verification on startup is required for subscription authentication. As a result, Live TV viewing is not compatible on devices without access to a network, such as Android devices only on WiFi. However, our On Demand content will be available. Note: data usage may apply to some advertising appearing with on demand content viewed through the app. Rogers Anyplace TV is available on Android devices with OS versions 2.3 up to 5.0. Please visit www.rogers.com/mobiletv for a full list of supported devices. Enjoy great programming wherever you happen to be with Rogers Anyplace TV!
release_text: Support for Android 5.0 Minor bug fixes

description: TouchScan is an app that allows you to read OBD2 vehicle data directly from your Android phone or tablet. You can clear your check engine light, read diagnostic trouble codes, estimate fuel economy and much more! Is your check engine light on? Do you want to monitor fuel economy and usage in your vehicle? Do you want cool looking gauges on your Android phone or tablet? If so, then TouchScan is the app for you! TouchScan is a vehicle diagnostics tool that connects to OBD-II or EOBD vehicles. Not sure if your vehicle is OBD-2, EOBD or JOBD compliant? See this page for more information: https://www.obdsoftware.net/knowledgebase/obd2compliant . TouchScan works with some JOBD compliant vehicles and in some cases requires modifications to the connection settings in the app. Please contact us for more information. You must have a Bluetooth ELM327 compatible scan tool to use this software. USB scan tools are also supported, but you must have a tablet running Honeycomb or later with USB host support to connect using a USB device. For recommended scan tools, see our website https://www.obdsoftware.net . Please note that cheap ELM clone adapters can be unreliable. TouchScan can connect to any ELM 327 compatible adapter, but the cheap clone adapters tend to have slow refresh rates and might disconnect randomly. TouchScan for Android is brought to you by OCTech, LLC, the makers of TouchScan and OBDwiz for Windows, OBD Fusion for iOS, and OBDLink for Android and iOS. Now you can get the same great features for your phone or tablet. TouchScan has the following features: - Read and clear diagnostic trouble codes and your Check Engine Light (MIL) - Real-time dashboard display - Real-time graphing - Fuel economy MPG, l/100km or km/l calculation - Create custom enhanced PIDs - Includes some built-in enhanced PIDs for Ford and GM vehicles - Multiple trip meters - Customizable dashboards with fast dashboard switching - Log data to CSV format, which can be loaded into Excel - Display battery voltage - Display Boost pressure (vehicle must support the required PIDs) - Read freeze frame data - English and Metric units - Over 90 supported PIDs - Displays vehicle information including VIN number and calibration ID - Emissions readiness for each US state - Oxygen Sensor Results (Mode $05) - On-board Monitoring Tests (Mode $06) - In-performance Tracking Counters (Mode $09) - GPS tracking - plot vehicle parameters on a map in real-time - Full diagnostic report that can be stored and emailed - Bluetooth, USB, and WiFi* scan tool support * Only WiFi scan tools that support infrastructure mode will work with Android devices.
release_text: Added an option to select the ECU when multiple ECUs are detected. Added the ability to fully customize units. Added support for importing/exporting app settings, dashboards, and PIDs. Added Dropbox support allowing you to share files, settings, and CSV files. Added a HUD option for dashboards. Added the ability to log user PIDs. Improved the fuel calculations for some vehicles. Fixed some issues when running on Lollipop. Fixed the O2 descriptions to display the correct sensor and bank numbers.

description: Mankind is in danger of extinction! Command a heroic star fleet of legendary captains and incredible spaceships to save humanity. Discover the incredible space combat MMORPG featured by Google in over 100 countries and enjoyed by millions. Play for FREE! ✔ All-out universe war!  Compete with thousands online players on one massive space battlefield ✔ Lead your own star fleet and reign as the top commander ✔ Recruit a fleet of heroic captains to explore the universe ✔ Forge the greatest alliance in the galaxy to dominate space ✔ Defeat ruthless foes across the galaxy to save humanity ✔ Use your own strategies and combat tactics to dominate opponents ✔ Conquer other online players in the galactic arena and reach the top of the rank. ✔ Customize each ship with powerful upgrades to form the ultimate fleet ✔ Explore the vast universe and discover the unknown ✔ Research advanced technologies to enhance your power ✔ Construct formidable space colonies to restore human civilization In the year 2841, an exciting new chapter in the story of humanity begins as we expand to the furthest reaches of space. In a sci-fi landscape of mystery, intrigue, and opportunity, you must uncover a devious plot to save mankind. Make strategic combat decisions and recruit the right commanders to join your fleet as you fight to uncover the truth. You’ll be faced with the threat of space pirates, terrorists, alien beings and opposing fleet commanders on your way to becoming a true legend. Join our online community: Follow us on Twitter: www.twitter.com/tap4fun Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/tap4fun
release_text: - Improved: Memory optimization - Improved: Daily Active Rewards - Improved: Scrolling function in announcements - Improved: Pandora Cluster functionality - Fixed: Minor bugs

description: Meltdown is a tactical arcade shooter featuring both singleplayer and intense online multiplayer. Become the most skilled soldier, choose your weapons, get the best upgrades, buckle up and start your mission. Be careful, each enemy has it’s own combat style, special AI and gear. Adapt to them to survive! FEATURES 30 Random Generated Levels 10 Upgradable ranged weapons 5 Melee weapons to cut down enemies Online Cross-Platform Co-Op Multiplayer up to 4 Players 3 Specializations (Soldier/Engineer/Medic)
release_text: - New Online-Multiplayer Deathmatch Mode - New Local-Multiplayer Arcade Mode (extra controllers required) - Added 10 extra armor pieces - Added Android TV support - Improved multiplayer networking - Improved controller inputs - Other Bugfixes & Tweaks

description: Version 2.0 now available! Tech Junkie brings you the latest and the most relevant technology news, hand picked and curated by Techmeme.com, the world's most popular technology news aggregation service. For thousands of people, including industry leading CEOs and the who's who of silicon valley, the day starts with Techmeme.com. And now Tech Junkie makes sure your favorite tech site is available in its truest form on your phones and tablets, with added features such as notification, news widget and more. Even if you don't have time to go through the news, Tech Junkie has a radio function that will read out the news for you. Version 2 Features: ★ Radio - reads out the news for you and can be accessed outside the app too with the new radio widget ★ Rich Notifications - Android 4.1+ devices will display multi-line notification with photo from the story ★ Dynamic Site Icons - if the icon (or logo) of a site is not available within the app, Tech Junkie will attempt to download and cache it directly from the source site ★ Swipe to close article (beta) - now you can close the mobile view by swiping horizontally, from left to right or right to left; ideal for one-handed use, instead of stretching for the back button. Other Features: ★ Scalable design - for both phones and tablets (for 7" like the Nexus 7 in particular) ★ Top News section - that shows only the most relevant news ★ River section - featuring all news stories ★ History tab - that provides a searchable list of your reading history ★ Events tab - that has a table of major technology events that are happening around the world ★ Mobile View - that loads articles faster, in a mobile friendly way and within the app ★ Color change - for news titles to indicate a story that has been read (similar to link color in web browsers) ★ Notifications - for top news only ★ Widget - that displays all stories from River section ★ Control the notification, set the refresh rate, ringtone, vibration, LED light and more What differentiates Tech Junkie from other tech news apps is that you only have to read the news once, instead of going through it again and again from different sites. For example if the same news appears at Engadget, Gizmodo, TechCrunch and The Verge, Tech Junkie displays prominently only the first site that was to report that news, groups the rest of the sites into a collection and hides it from the main view. Alternate sources and relevant tweets of the same news can be accessed by clicking the "More" and "Tweets" button respectively. And when one or more news items are related, they are properly grouped like on the Techmeme website. Author names (when available) are also properly mentioned just above the story title (like Ian Sherr / Wall Street Journal, John Roberts / New York Times, John Paczkowski / AllThingsD), so that you can easily identify your favorite author's works. Download Tech Junkie today and have your daily dose of relevant technology news, without reading the same story....twice. New Permissions Explained:- READ PHONE STATE permission is used to stop the radio when you receive an incoming call. Otherwise the radio will continue playing and you won't be able to hear your caller. MODIFY OR DELETE THE CONTENTS OF YOUR SD CARD permission is used to cache the site icons downloaded. Disclaimer:- Tech Junkie is in no way affiliated with Techmeme.com. We love Techmeme and wanted to provide the best user experience for the site, on phones and tablets. We do believe nothing can match the convenience of visiting Techmeme.com directly when using a PC and would recommend you to do so. But when you are on the go, Tech Junkie will come in handy. All icon copyrights belong to the respective sites.
release_text: v2.13 - Bug fixes v2.12 - Fixed loading error - Improvements to Mobile View v2.0 - News radio using Text to Speech engine - Rich notifications that display the full title - New widget for radio - Dynamic site icons - Progress bar for mobile view - Swipe horizontally to close mobile view (beta) - Bug fixes for widget, events and mobile view

支持135种货币的自由兑换，其中的22种已预先添加到自选列表。用户可点击菜单键，添加剩余种类的货币。 如果觉得这个软件靠谱，记得给我五颗星，以资鼓励。虽然是兴趣，这软件也花了我不少时间，泄泄：） Youtube上的演示视频。（ http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TD6hNSkHzCI ） 市面上有多款汇率换算工具，大多是英文版，同时缺乏简单易用的用户界面。 这款汇率换算工具提供以下卖点： 1.针对性强：为人民币量身打造，预先添加22种主流和邻近国家的货币，以方便用户（图三图四） 2.简单易用：当靠手指滑动，便可浏览各种汇率，图标和钞票样本（前四张图） 3.走势比较：将不同汇率的走势图放在同一页，便于比较（图二） 4. 显示样本：显示主流货币钞票样本，以免换到假钞，同时让软件具有趣味性（图一） 5.节省流量：钞票样本在第一次载入后，可长期离线浏览。一年走势图载入后可在当日离线浏览 6.数据可靠：数据源于雅虎金融 7.多种货币：支持133种货币的自由兑换 ======= 用户手册 ======= × 浏览汇率页，走势页，钞票样本页， 将手指水平滑动 ×浏览整页信息 将手指竖直滑动 ×更新数据（三种方法） 1.运行程序，数据便会自动更新 2.点击“更新行”（图三图四），数据便会更新 3. 在菜单中选择更新数据（图六） ×计算汇率 点击汇率行，汇率计算窗口便会跳出,输入兑换数目（图八） × 查看钞票样本 按着汇率行不放，“选项”窗口便会跳出，选择“秀钞票”。 × 删除汇率 按着汇率行不放，“选项”窗口便会跳出，选择“删除”。 ×添加或 删除多种汇率（图7） 1.点击菜单按钮（手机右键或左键），选择“编辑自选汇率”，“编辑自选汇率”窗口便会打开。添加要兑换的货币，或删除要兑换的货币 2.点击 下拉条，可选择被兑换货币。 ×查看版本信息 1.点击菜单按钮（手机右键或左键），选择“版本” ======= 版本历史 ======= 版本3.8 （2013-11-23） 跟新加拿大钞票样图至最新版（2011系列）。 修改哈萨克货币名称为“哈萨克斯坦腾格” 谢谢用户的反馈。 版本3.7 （2013-10-19） 跟新美元，印尼盾，菲律宾比索的无效钞票链接。 版本3.6 跟新“乌克兰”国旗。谢谢用户指出错误。 版本3.5 将马来西亚令吉的钞票图片更新为2011年发行的第四版。 版本3.4 （2013-07-13） 添加黄金的兑换率。由于黄金走势图使用国际单位"金衡盎司"而不是"克"，为了保持数值上的一致性，兑换率单位同样使用“金衡盎司”.1金衡盎司 = 31.1034768 克.目前雅虎金融仅提供5日的黄金走势图. 由于缺少白银的走势图，暂不添加白银的兑换率。 版本3.3 波兰兹罗提被错写成挪威克朗,版本3.3给予修改。谢谢用户的反馈，使得问题得以发现。 版本3.2（2013-06-08） 跟换10美元反面图片的网络地址，以减低流量。 版本3.0 （2013-05-24） 修改“编辑自选汇率”的用户界面。让复选框清晰易见。 根据用户的反馈，缩小关闭按钮。 在“钞票样本”页面，添加关闭按钮。 版本2.8 预先添加"韩元"到自选列表。 版本2.7 减少数据文件的读写次数，以提高程序的稳定性。 版本2.6 修复图形页面的同步问题。 版本2.5 由于没有安卓3.0版本以下的用户，取消3.0版本以下的支持。 解决错误更新时间的问题。 版本2.4 尝试解决滑动屏幕时可能出错的问题。 版本2.3 将走势图背景颜色设置为黑以省电。 版本2.2 2013年1月26日 基于“Easy Global Currency Converter” 版本2.1，开发汇率换算(简体版) 版本2.2 ================== 支持133种货币自由兑换 =========== Support 135 kinds of freely convertible currency, of which 22 kinds have been previously added to the choice list. Users can click the menu button, add the remaining types of currencies. If you think this software is tricky, remember to give me five stars, for encouragement. Although interest in this software I spent a lot of time, vent to vent :) Demo video on Youtube. (Http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TD6hNSkHzCI) There are a variety of exchange rate conversion tools, mostly in English, while the lack of a simple-to-use user interface. The currency converter tool provides the following selling points: 1. Targeted: RMB tailored previously added 22 kinds of mainstream and currencies of neighboring countries, to facilitate the user (Figure III Figure IV) 2. Easy to use: When by sliding your finger, you can browse all kinds of exchange rates, icons and banknotes samples (before four figures) 3. Trend: different exchange rate charts on the same page, to facilitate comparison (Figure 2) 4 shows a sample: Shows the mainstream currency banknote samples, so as not to change to the counterfeit money, have fun at the same time let the software (Figure 1) 5. save traffic: banknote samples after the first loaded, long-term off-line browsing. Chart one year after the date of loading viewed offline 6. Data reliability: data from the Yahoo Finance 7. A variety of currencies: supports 133 kinds of freely convertible currencies ======= User's manual ======= × browse exchange rate page, trend pages, notes sample page, Slide your finger horizontally × browse the entire page The vertical sliding finger × update data (three methods) 1. Run the program, the data will be automatically updated 2. Click the "Update rows" (Figure III Figure IV), the data will be updated 3. Select the update data (Figure 6) in the menu × calculate the exchange rate Click on exchange rate row, exchange rates will jump out the window, enter the number of exchange (Figure 8) × See a sample bill Hold the line according to the exchange rate, "Options" window will pop, choose "show notes." × Remove Rates Hold the line according to the exchange rate, "Options" window will jump out, select "Delete." × add or delete multiple exchange rates (Figure 7) 1. Click on the menu button (the phone right or left), select "Edit Preferences exchange rate", "Edit Preferences Rates" window will open. To add a currency exchange, or delete currency to exchange 2. Click on the drop-down bar, may be optionally convertible currency. × view version information 1. Click on the menu button (the phone right or left), select "Version" ======= Version History ======= Version 3.8 (2013-11-23) Canadian banknotes with new comp image to the latest version (2011 series). Modify the Kazakh currency name as "Kazakhstan tenge" Thank you for user feedback. Version 3.7 (2013-10-19) With the new dollar, Indonesian rupiah, Philippine peso banknote invalid link. Version 3.6 With the new "Ukraine" flag. Thank you, the user of any mistakes. Version 3.5 The Malaysian Ringgit banknotes image update for the fourth edition published in 2011. Version 3.4 (2013-07-13) Adding gold exchange rate. Since gold chart using the international unit "troy ounce" instead of "g", in order to maintain the consistency of the value on the exchange unit also uses "troy ounce" .1 troy ounce = 31.1034768 grams. Currently only available Yahoo Finance gold charts 5th. Due to the lack of silver charts, temporarily add silver exchange. Version 3.3 Norwegian krone Polish zloty was written in the wrong, version 3.3 give modified. Thank you for user feedback, so the problem is found. Version 3.2 (2013-06-08) $ 10 with changing negative picture of the network address, in order to reduce traffic. Version 3.0 (2013-05-24) Modify the "Edit Preferences exchange rate," the user interface. Let checkbox clear and easy to see. According to user feedback, reduce the Close button. In the "notes Samples" page, add the Close button. Version 2.8 Previously added "won" the choice list. Version 2.7 Reduce the number of read and write data files to improve the stability of the program. Version 2.6 Repair synchronization graphic page. Version 2.5 Since there is no Android version 3.0 or less users, version 3.0 following the withdrawal of support. Solve the problem of the wrong update. release_text: 版本5.8 （2015-01-24） 网友说，你这程序看图片（是钞票样本，不是美女）时总出问题啊！还好今天是周末，忙了一早搞定，两个改动：一.压缩图片；二.将图片放在靠谱的地方。 版本5.6 （2014-05-31） 用户反馈说，你肿么可以没有中非法郎和西非法郎，啊，没听过呀，不过还是加了。安了。 版本5.5 （2014-04-27） 有用户反馈，说背景怎么是白滴，酱紫看不清字。以前的版本用的是缺省背景颜色，所以有些鸡子是白的，有些是黑的。这个版本将背景强行设置为黑色，黑色省电嘛，字看的也清楚。版本5.4不吉利，直接上5.5。安了。 版本5.3 （2014-04-20） 解决了安卓4.4以上机子无法显示整张走势图的问题。 版本5.0 （2013-11-24） 重要发布：添加编辑图表功能。 用户可以通过菜单键，选择编辑图表。 用户可以选择走势图的11种不同时间区间，从一天，一个星期，一直到五年或更久。 用户可以选择走势图的17种不同技术指标，包括移动平均线，MACD等等。 做软件就是为了玩，谢谢大家用我的软件，大家玩的开心。

description: SatCalc Pro is a powerful satellite antenna angle calculator and Augmented Reality Satellite Finder / dish pointer. This application brings the functionalities of an Anemometer (max 20 m/s) to your phone. Dynamic and Average wind speed measuring modes with real time charts, wind direction display (compass). Suitable for any winter and summer windsport! >>Quick start The application relies on the mobile microphone signal. To achieve the best results consider the following: 1) Easy calibration (only the first time): Some mobiles are automatically calibrated in the first installation phase. For details see the calibration section of the user manual 2) avoid measurement in presence of loud noises (heavy traffic,motorbikes, trucks, loud talking,shots) 3) keep your fingers away from the mobile microphone (hold it by the top) and keep it in vertical position 4) orient the back of the phone in the direction of the wind (keeping the display in front of you) 5) click on one of the function buttons >>Troubleshooting 1) Wrong calibration: You must set the Noise level (and eventually the max SPL): see the User's Guide calibration section. 2) Attenuation on mobile mic: your measurements never reach the thereshold blue line. Restart android. 3) The application is sensible to low level talking (at a distance > 50 cm from the mic): go in the settings menu and disable ACG (check on). 4) No signals detected below 1 m/s or over 20 m/s: the smart phone microphones do not work under/over a specific pressure. Read the embedded User Guide: for any info or troubleshooting you can contact us at support@gaiacons.com .

description: “Broken Sword 2 – La profezia dei Maya: Rimasterizzato” vede il ritorno di George Stobbart e Nico Collard nel seguito del campione d'incassi “Broken Sword – Il segreto dei Templari”, considerato da molti la migliore avventura disponibile per Android. Nel corso di un'indagine su una banda di trafficanti di droga, la giornalista Nico Collard s'imbatte inaspettatamente in un antico manufatto. Quella tavoletta di ossidiana intagliata trascinerà lei e il suo compagno di avventure George Stobbart in una storia piena di enigmi, intrighi e inganni, in cui i nostri due eroi dovranno affrontare dei potenti antagonisti decisi a tutto pur di realizzare i loro malvagi intenti. Tormenti, terrore, sacrifici rituali e massacri sono ciò che si cela sotto il velo di un arcano mistero maya. Rapimenti, tesori rubati, spionaggio e un feroce barone della droga rappresentano il male minore, mentre forze di natura divina minacciano di annientare l'umanità! Nervi saldi, astuzia e perspicacia risulteranno essenziali per completare questa avventura, tanto impegnativa quanto emozionante. Sarai all'altezza della sfida? “Broken Sword 2 - La profezia dei Maya: Rimasterizzato” costituisce una straordinaria rivisitazione del titolo originale che ha venduto milioni di copie. Oltre a un esclusivo fumetto digitale interattivo creato da Dave Gibbons, co-autore di “Watchmen’”, il gioco è arricchito da espressioni del volto animate, grafica potenziata, musiche di alta qualità, un sistema di suggerimenti contestuali e l'utile presenza del diario. L'integrazione del gioco con Dropbox, inoltre, rende possibile l'esclusiva funzione di salvataggio multipiattaforma, permettendo ai giocatori di godersi la stessa avventura su più sistemi contemporaneamente e molte altre novità. Dialoghi doppiati completamente in italiano, con la possibilità di sottotitoli in italiano, inglese, francese, tedesco e spagnolo. A qualsiasi versione possono essere aggiunti i file audio di altre lingue per permettere un supporto linguistico adeguato.

Are you commuting on Brisbane's SEQ TransLink public transport? Then Arrivo Brisbane is your ideal companion. Arrivo Brisbane SEQ is a powerful offline timetable app which provides fast timetable access for all transport on TransLink's transport network in Brisbane and South East Queensland. BUSES, TRAINS & FERRY. With Arrivo in your pocket you have access to TransLink's transit information anywhere and anytime. Unlike other transit applications you do not need network access to check your timetable information. This means you get results fast. Arrivo makes your commute easy with a variety of benefits: • Arrivo works anytime and anywhere. No data network connection required. • Immediately find the next departure for your Stop. By Route or by Stop name. • View the Stops for your Trip on the map (maps screens require a network connection). • Use predictive search from the action bar on the top of the app to quickly find your Route or Stop. • View next Departures for any transit Stop or Station in Brisbane and South East Queensland (SEQ). • View Trip details. • All the timetable information is stored on your phone. • Arrivo informs you when updated timetable information is available for download from the 'Settings' screen. Don't worry, Arrivo has the tiniest timetable files among all other transit apps out there. This saves you both bandwidth and storage space on your device. Check your notifications bar to download the most up-to-date timetable available. • Note: all times displayed are local Brisbane times. Get access to fast timetable information and download Arrivo Brisbane today! For any feedback or bugs please contact us on Twitter (@trip_mate), our website ( http://www.tripmate.info/contact ) or like us on Facebook ( http://facebook.com/tripmateapp ).

Codeword Unlimited is an application to play the popular word game known as Codeword (also known as Cipher crosswords). For those unfamiliar with Codeword puzzles, they provide a grid of words, similar to a normal crossword, but with no clues, rather a few initially provided letters, and a number in each square in the gird to indicate its (as yet unknown) letter. All boxes with the same number must use the same letter. From that information and the few initially provided letters it is possible to work out which words will fit in the boxes. Hence you are decoding (or decyphering) the numbers into letters to reveal the hidden words. Usually all 26 letters of the alphabet are used in the codeword, although not always (and unused letters appear crossed out in the keyboard). Feature list: 1) Unlimited number of codewords!! They are created on-the-fly using the application's advanced generator engine and it's built-in word list. 2) The player decides the number of rows and columns (from 3 to 20). This allows the game to be suitable for all kinds of mobile-phones and tablets. 3) Difficultly level can be specified by the user, which determines the pool of words the generator will use. The larger the pool the greater the difficulty. There is even an early learner mode with a limited number of words, aimed at children and English language learners. The number of starting letters can also be specified. Higher scores can be obtained with more difficult codewords. 4) When a player touches a box, all boxes with the same number are highlighted. 5) For any word in the grid for which all squares are assigned to letters, Codeword Unlimited will highlight if that word is NOT an allowed word in the word list it uses to generate its codewords. This helps you when you have mistakes in your current assignments (saving you lots of time and frustration!). 6) The game will show the player if a completed word is wrong (is not in its word list). 7) An on-screen keyboard means it is much easier and more comfortable to play. 8) The definition of a completed word can be viewed. This is useful if you do not know it, or you are learning a foreign language (internet connection required). 9) Choose the language of the word list, from a large range of downloadable dictionaries. 26 languages are currently available (see below). 10) Can be played in portrait or landscape mode. Just rotate your device and the display adjusts automatically. 11) Game contains achievements integrated into Google Play's "Game Services". Other similar applications want you to pay for more Codewords, but this game provides you with endless puzzles, all for free!! Each game is assigned a difficulty level from 0 (easy) to 9 (very hard). The difficulty level is determined by the settings. Each difficulty level maintains the high scores (measured by fastest time to complete the game). The game displays the best 20 scores for each difficulty level. Compare your high scores with others around the world by using Google Play's "Game Services". If the player is in difficulty, the application provides two very useful aids. (1) The game can provide another decoded letter. (2) The game can show you potential answers for an uncompleted word. The game uses the letters that you have already decoded and displays the matching words. Dictionaries available are English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Arabic, Bulgarian, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Polish, Norwegian, Romanian, Serbian(Latin), Serbian(Cyrillic), Slovak, Slovene, Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian and more coming later

Check your car performance and compete in acceleration online! Car accelerometer application "Street Racing Speedometer" especially for speed fans. Car performance and speed measurement: - 0-35 mph (0-60 km/h) acceleration - 0-60 mph (0-100 km/h) acceleration - highest reached speed Features: - the best accuracy in combination with the accelerometer (G-Force) and GPS data - automatic measurements, no clicks when driving - acceleration timer - speedometer - best racing records one click sharing on Facebook and Twitter Usage guide: - Set personal data and preferences with appropriate Menu item (optional) - Place phone to the fixed position in the car - Start application (or click "Reset" if already started) - Wait for GPS connection and 0 point at speedometer - Don't move phone or switch off screen untill finish - Enjoy driving - For consequent car acceleration measurement one will need to stop and "fix" zero speed point on the screen for 2-3 seconds (it could be some GPS related delay – please, stay calm :) - Review your results and click to share at your Facebook and Twitter accounts Notes: Smartphone accelerometer is used to get precise car acceleration data from zero to 60 times and further, so in order to get correct reliable values we recommend to place phone in car handler or other fixed case to avoid phone sliding or rotating. It is preferred to take measurements while driving on the straight flat road (following traffic rules, of course :). Ups, downs and turns at the acceleration line could strongly affect the results’ precision. We’ve got big plans for advancing Street Racing Speedometer Android App, so your comments and propositions are welcomed. Thanks! That's all for now. Time to drive!

Only for NVIDIA Tegra 4 / Tegra 3 Powered Devices. Winner at the Independent Games Festival 2010, Puddle THD is now available exclusively on devices using Tegra technology. Puddle THD harnesses the power of the NVIDIA Tegra powered devices to produce an unprecedented realistic physics-based gaming experience! Dive into Puddle THD, a game unlike any other where you have to guide a puddle of fluid by tilting the environment to the left or right! Play carefully taking friction, gravity and temperature into account, and by using the unique properties of each type of fluid (water, oil, nitroglycerin, molten lava...) in a range of original environments. Conserve as much fluid as possible when crossing a variety of obstacles such as burning passageways, carnivorous plants and electric currents! Key Features: - Optimized for Tegra 3 powered devices featuring console-quality HD graphics, highest quality shaders, amazing fluid simulation! - 49 levels - Support for Bluetooth or USB game controllers. (USB gamepads only supported on Android 3.1 or higher) - Compare your skills with those of your friends and the worldwide GREE community! Download the free trial version or purchase the complete game, available now. Languages Supported: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Russian, Japanese, Korean, Chinese. Easily search and find interesting content from many sources, including your mobile device and home network, and watch it on an internet connected TV or mobile device. Enjoy millions of videos, images, and songs and share with friends. With this powerful ZappoTV app you can do the following: • SEARCH - Easily search, find, and browse videos, photos, or music and watch on TV directly from your Android phone. • DISCOVER - Discover new and featured videos every day across a number of video topic channels for you to enjoy. Browse channels using easy-to-navigate video carousels. • SEND TO TV - Stream music and videos directly to your TV or mobile device. No installation needed (except this app). • ACCESS MEDIA - Access your photo and social networking accounts to watch on TV. • MANAGE PLAYLISTS - Create and Manage playlists of music and enjoy on your mobile or TV. FEATURES • Video search • Add to favorites • View and manage history • Watch on TV • Create and manage music playlists • Sharing • Continuous video and music play • Upload videos and photos • Access to your DLNA Home Media Servers (This feature is an in-app purchase) APPLICATION SECTIONS BROWSE: • Search and find your music, photos, and videos from multiple content sources including your Android device, your home network or the Internet. • Share via e-mail, Twitter, and Facebook Content includes: • Video Podcasts • YouTube videos • Your Music, photos, and videos from your Android device [Android Gallery] • SHOUTcast Internet radio • Facebook videos and photos from you and your friends • Flickr photos • Picasa (Web Album) photos NOW PLAYING: • The “Now Playing” screen provides information about the content that you are watching on TV using ZappoTV. • Music and Video player controls (i.e. previous, pause, play, next, and volume) appear, depending on the capabilities of your setup. MYZAPPOTV: • Sign out of ZappoTV. • Delete your viewing history. • Send application logs to ZappoTV. DEVICES: • Select the external connected device (or TV itself) you would like to use to access your TV. This is a great way for you to use multiple TVs in your home. THINGS TO KNOW • MyZappoTV > Favorites, lets you access and manage your viewing history. • MyZappoTV > History makes it super easy to watch previous viewed photos or videos. REQUIREMENTS TO GET STARTED • Android 2.1 and later versions. • ZappoTV is available in many countries. The selection of media content may vary by country. • ZappoTV account is required. • Streaming of music, images, and videos requires an active Wi-Fi or cellular data connection and a ZappoTV account. You will have limited functionality when you are not connected to a Wi-Fi network or when you don't have a cellular data connection. • To watch ZappoTV on TV, you will need one of the ZappoTV compatible connected devices (see link below). • Some content may not be compatible with ZappoTV or your TV. SUPPORTED DEVICES This version of the ZappoTV application supports: • AppleTV (AirPlay) • Western Digital Media Players (WD TV Live, WD TV Live Plus, WD TV Live Hub) • Samsung SmartTVs • LG Connected TVs • Xbox 360 (when in Media Center Extender) • XBMC • Popcorn Hour and Popbox • Windows Media Player (on Vista or Windows 7) Have a look at http://www.zappo.tv/devices.html for details. SUPPORT: We would appreciate if you would report any issues you have with regard to the app at info@zappo.tv . When contacting our support team , please provide the app name, your device name and Android OS version used as well as a brief description of the issue.

description: Little princesses love to play dressing up, put on makeup, try out different hairstyles and do a beauty makeover. Our educational colouring book combines the things that your little angels love best, they get to design & paint their own outfits & accessories, whether it's for school, the beach, a walk in the park, a dance or a costume party. Watch your kids as they get more and more creative in combining different colours from our 68-color palette, as well as different painting tools, brushes, pencils, crayons and markers. Finger painting at its' best, maximum creativity and no-mess at all :) Features: • Simple & intuitive child-friendly interface & illustrations • Numerous animations to make the app experience even more fun & addictive • 35 cool age-apropriate illustrations* • 4 Amazing textures representing real brushes, markers, color pencils and crayons with different sizes to choose from • Easy navigation between illustrations • Slider color picker representing a vibrant 68 - color palette • Start over with your painting in just one click or erase it partially, whichever works best for you • Pleasant sounds which you can turn on/off • Built-in gallery to store all the coloring masterpieces & share them with friends and family via email • Showcase your art on our Art Wall of Fame :) Privacy Disclosure: As parents ourselves, iAbuzz takes children's wellness and privacy very seriously. Our app: • Does not contain links to social networks • Does not collect personal data Feedback Please: If you have any feedback and suggestions on how we could further improve the design and interaction of our apps and games, please visit our website http://iabuzz.com/ or leave us a message at kids@iabuzz.com . We would be glad to hear from you as we are committed to update all of our apps and games on a regular basis with new features and also want to get some ideas for future app development. * All the drawing illustrations in this game are created by iAbuzz, and all their copyright belongs solely to Abuzz D.O.O. Macedonia.

description: The Rate of Return Calculator is the one-stop for all your needs to determine rate of return. This app is good for: - calculate expected rate of return - calculate required rate of return - calculating expected rate of return - annual compound rate of return The Rate of Return calculator provides an instant way in calculating your financial investments with easy to use interface and rapid-fast response. The following are the formulas ths calculator is included: - Net Return - Return on Equity - Net Return on Equity - Payback ratio - Cash-on-Cash Return - Cash Income - Return on Purchase Price - Return on Cash Invested - Return on Net Investment - Dividend Yield - Current Yield on a Bond - Earnings per Share (EPS) - Price/Earnings Ratio - Annualized Return

Productivity Timer is a free unofficial Pomodoro Technique® timer app. The Pomodoro Technique® is a way to manage your time effectively. It is a method of breaking down work periods into 25 minute slices separated by short breaks. This simple and easy-to-use unofficial Pomodoro timer app will help you to set the Pomodoro times - including the short break and long break. - Pomodoro: Set a time with 25 minutes - Short Break: Set a time with 5 minutes - Long Break: Set a time with 15 minutes Do more with less time and increase your productivity and the quality of your work. Pomodoro Technique® is a registered trademark of Francesco Cirillo. This application is not affiliated by, associated with nor endorsed by the Pomodoro Technique® or Francesco Cirillo. Ad free timer app.

The number 1 Video Game News app, personalized with hundreds of news sources in a simple, sleek interface optimized for smartphones, tablets and wearables. It doesn’t matter what your platform of choice is, whether it's next-gen console, PC or mobile – Appy Gamer has your gaming news covered! - Visual: Get all the latest Video Game News from your favorite topics in a highly visual format. - Smart: Appy Gamer learns as you read, personalizing your news experience automatically. - In the know: My News Digest is your daily news briefing built around YOU. - Complete: We bring you complete articles with full text, photos and videos from trusted sources around the world. - Yours: Choose from over 1m topics for a custom home screen and news experience. - In-depth: Explore related topics via Tag Nav™, our innovative news navigation system. - Customizable: Add custom headlines from your favorite RSS news feeds. description: Extend the world of "METAL GEAR SOLID V: GROUND ZEROES" (PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4, Xbox 360*, Xbox One) into the palm of your hands. * Note: Some Xbox 360 features require the use of Microsoft's "Smart Glass" application. Refer to the Xbox 360 homeplage for details. ---------------------------------- Certain features within this application require a local WiFi connection. ---------------------------------- *Application Description* Use this app as a support terminal to display maps, call support helicopters while playing the console version of METAL GEAR SOLID V: GROUND ZEROES. While away from the main game, brush up on intel by reviewing classified recordings or listen to music tracks featuired within the game. ---------------------------------- * Use iDROID Mode to Navigate ---------------------------------- Linking your app to the main game allows yo to navigate the world of Ground Zeroes by using the iDROID as a navigational system and support terminal for calling support helicopters. * This mode requires a WiFi environment to connectt to your game system. For more information, please refer to the "HOW TO CONNECT" menu within the app. ---------------------------------- * Mother Base Mode ---------------------------------- Expand Mother Base, build a private army, and dispatch troops to battlefields around the globe. Manage your forces and build your military might in this military base building simulation. Play as a stand-alone app, or sync with with MGSV: GROUND ZEROES to unlock special troops and weapons obtained from within the main game! ---------------------------------- * Listen to audio tracks anytime anywhere ---------------------------------- Once you've heard an audio track within the main game with iDROID Mode, you can use this app to play back those tracks at anytime with your smart device. ---------------------------------- * The latest intel on MGS:GZ at the tip of your fingers ---------------------------------- Use the DATA PORTAL to get all of the latest info on MGSV:GZ. [Service Provider] Konami Digital Entertainment, Inc. [Caution] - Smartphones and tablets running Android 4.0 or later

ProRecord is an audio recorder to capture audio signals with your mobile. Use it as a voice recorder and store your personal memos and todos. Capture song samples or speeches you listen to. ProRecord stores everything on your external storage within its own database so you will not have to worry about your filesystem. Your recordings can be easily shared, e.g. by E-Mail as attachements. The recordings will be synced to your phone filesystem as well for easy access. With only 1 click you can record anything you want. ProRecord is a useful tool if you want to keep an audio memo or have something you want to remember. Try it now! ProRecord is at a very early stage, since it is merely a simple tool I did as an exercise. ** Please note. The free version is ad supported

It is ToDo (do/task) list application. This application program has provided the following features though a basic function is similar to a general ToDo list (addition/edit/deletion of the task). - The category is classified and ToDo (task) is managed. The function to divide ToDo (task) according to the category is installed. It is possible to use it separately by the scene like work by private and work by the business, etc. - Equipped with reminder function of ToDo (task) So as not to forget the task of setting it, the reminder function is installed in Ms ToDo. The setting etc. that switch the display of priority besides the alarm is notified and stand out can be specified when becoming specified time. - Widget display of ToDo (task) It corresponds to the widget display in Ms ToDo. As a result, the content of the task can be confirmed that the application is not started. - Memo function It specializes in the memo function in Ms ToDo. The set memo is a composition in which it comes to be able to confirm, and making the memo can be edited directly from the task list from among the task list (ToDo list). - Priority setting function of ToDo (task) The priority setting of the task can be specified in Ms ToDo. Priority is a composition that comes to be able to set, and understands from the task list from among five stages at one view. - Sort function and individual sort function of ToDo (task) Two or more sort functions of the task are prepared in Ms ToDo. Moreover, the feature of this application program is to be able to set more detailed priority because it can individually do the sort. - Color change function The color variation of availably and the application was abundantly collected by a favorite design. 【 update history 】 - Version 1.8.0 ･To open the category and the task by the double touch, the function is repaired. ･Addition of hint display function ･The position of "Cancellation" "OK" button is moved under the screen. - Version 1.7.0 ･The number of 2×1 two widgets has been increased to the →6 piece. ･Trouble from which an automatic sorting is not executed when the task is moved and it copies it is corrected. ･Trouble to which the display of the widget is not updated when the category name is changed is corrected.

description: Doctor X, these injured athletes need your help! Treat them with professional medical tools and help them return to the field! Get your head in the game and play your favorite sports with the world’s best athletes! Doctor X, we need your medical expertise at the clinic! Let The Games Begin! Start by selecting an athlete from 4 popular sports-- soccer, tennis, basketball, and football-- and let the games begin! You can play with the world’s best sport stars! Sport Mini-Game Fun! Choose a player and play an exciting mini-game in their sport, like football, soccer, baseball, and tennis! Score goals, shoot some hoops, serve some tennis balls! Watch out though, your athlete might get injured and need some help from Doctor X! Doctor X Courtside Clinic Treatment! They’ve shown off their skills in football, soccer, tennis, and basketball, now show off yours in medicine at the clinic, Doctor X! Gain access to all of their games, equipment, and clothes, Doctor X! description: "The graphics are bright and appealing, the controls are dead-on...Most importantly, once you start playing, it’s hard to stop." - slidetoplay.com Over 12 million players on Android and iOS devices can't be wrong! The ORIGINAL and best motorcycle survival game! Ride your motorcycle at insane speeds through ever changing traffic. Your reflexes will mean the difference between surviving or crashing in spectacular fashion. Do you have what it takes to reach TOP SPEED? HOW TO PLAY - Tilt your phone/tablet to steer left and right - Stay away from cars, walls, and cops - Touch the screen to wheelie and perform other special abilities - Pick up coins to earn money for awesome items - Hang on for dear life! FEATURES * Crazy addictive gameplay with ultra smooth tilt controls * 10 different characters to play, each with their own unique abilities and gameplay! * Cool upgrades and items to earn * Eye popping high definition 3D graphics * Environments that change every day you play * Lifelike character animations and physics * Global leaderboards * Facebook integration: compete with your friends for top score and post brags to your wall * Awesome realistic sound effects recorded from real motorcycles, including a sport bike, chopper, dirt bike, and a cafe racer! BONUS TIPS - Pick up "Lane Splitter" bonuses by navigating your way in between cars during heavy traffic areas - Compete for best wheelie score by holding the screen to wheelie while playing as Jake or Jonny - If a cop is on your tail, get 500ft away to evade him, or buy some donuts to bribe him - Buy a helmet to protect you from one crash -- More detail about phone permissions needed by Lane Splitter: Read phone status and identity: This allows us to use Tapjoy to bring you offers that you can optionally use to get free coins. None of your personal information is ever read or distributed without your permission. Learn more at support.tapjoy.com. Network access: This is used for the in game ads and also allows us to submit your high scores to our score server. If you don't want your scores submitted, you can turn off that feature in the options screen. You can also play the game offline. Prevent device from sleeping: This is activated only during gameplay, so that your device doesn't go to sleep in the middle of a game.
release_text: - New hero: Dr. Mocha, maverick inventor! - Free hero trials: play characters for a limited number of times without having to unlock them! Follow Lane Splitter on Facebook to see which heroes will be available next. - Fixed bug with magnet and coin counter, and other fixes.

This application demonstrates the capabilities of various sensors and sensor-fusions. Data from the Gyroscope, Accelerometer and compass are combined in different ways and the result is shown as a cube that can be rotated by rotating the device. The major novelty in this application is the fusion of virtual sensors: "Improved Orientation Sensor 1" and "Improved Orientation Sensor 2" fuse the Android Rotation Vector with the virtual Gyroscope sensor to achieve a pose estimation with a previously unknown stability and precision. Apart from these two sensors, the following sensors are available for comparison: - Improved Orientation Sensor 1 (Sensor fusion of Android Rotation Vector and Calibrated Gyroscope - less stable but more accurate) - Improved Orientation Sensor 2 (Sensor fusion of Android Rotation Vector and Calibrated Gyroscope - more stable but less accurate) - Android Rotation Vector (Kalman filter fusion of Accelerometer + Gyroscope + Compass) - Calibrated Gyroscope (Separate result of Kalman filter fusion of Accelerometer + Gyroscope + Compass) - Gravity + Compass - Accelerometer + Compass - Deprecated Android Orientation Sensor (Complementary filter fusion of Accelerometer + Gyroscope + Compass) The source code is publicly available and the link can be found in the About-section.
release_text: Update 1.2 - Check if gyroscope is available. If not, a message is shown upon start to notify the user, that the app will not work properly.

★★전 마켓 누적 다운로드 500만! ★★웃사 회원님들이 올린 사진이 20만장! 지금도 어디에선가 웃사 폐인을 양산하고 있을 대한민국 NO.1 모바일 유머 커뮤니티 웃사! 빵터지는 웃긴사진과 댓글로 가득찬 웃사는 한국 최고 + 원조 '웃긴사진 공유 앱' 입니다. 이미 수십만의 유저들이 매일 웃사에 열광하고 있습니다. 하루 한번이라도 웃긴사진을 봐야 하는 웃사앓이에 빠져보아요! 당신은 이미 웃사를 광 클릭하고 있을지도…… ※ 2015.4월29일 업데이트 공지 안 본 웃사만 볼 수 있는 기능 추가 ※ 2015.3월17일 업데이트 공지 ▶웃사 레벨 웃사 레벨 기능에 계급이 더해졌습니다. 계급에 따른 마크가 달라졌으며 각 해당하는 레벨 범위에 따라 계급 표시 마크가 달라집니다. 계급 표시 마크는 닉네임이 보이는 곳에서 모두 적용되며 추후 특정 계급 유저분들은 '명예의 전당'으로 게시될 예정입니다. ▶블로그 포스팅 웃사를 블로그에 올릴 때 따로 캡쳐해서 블로그에 사진 넣고 글쓰기가 많이 귀찮으셨죠? 이제 그렇게 안 하셔도 됩니다!! 블로그로 공유를 누르시면 웃사가 자동으로 포스팅 됩니다. ▶추천인 가입할 때 추천인으로 다른 유저분의 닉네임을 써주시면 경험치 500을 드립니다. 추천 받으시는 분은 추천인 횟수 제한 없이 추천 받을 때 마다 경험치 500을 드립니다. ※ 2014.12월23일 업데이트 공지 ▶ 제목, 작성자가 표시되는 리스트 추가 ▶ 약간의 UI 변경 등... ※ 2014.7월23일 업데이트 공지 ▶ 웃사 공유시 점수 부여 ▶ 움짤(GIF) 저장 가능 ▶ 당겨서(놓아서) 새로고침이 조작하기 불편하여 기존 방식으로 변경 ▶ 등... 깨알 같은 기능이 개선 되었습니다. ※ 2014.7월11일 업데이트 공지 ▶ 새로운 디자인 적용 ▶ 사용자 레벨 기능 ▶ 댓글에 사진 등록 ▶ 회원 가입 없이 카카오톡 또는 네이버, 구글, 페이스북, 트위터 아이디로 로그인 ▶ 즐겨찾기 일괄 삭제 가능 ▶ 웃사 제목 검색 ▶ 등... 깨알 같은 기능이 추가 되었습니다. ※ 2013년 업데이트 공지 ▶ 가끔씩 이상종료되는 버그를 수정했습니다. ▶ 사진 전환을 개선했습니다. ▶ 페이스북 공유를 수정했습니다. ▶ 검색 기능 - 웃사를 제목으로 검색할 수 있습니다. ▶ 금칙어 대체표시 - 19금, 욕설등이 ** 로 대체 표시됩니다. ▶ 동영상보기 - 유튜브앱으로 가지 않고 웃사에서 바로 볼 수 있습니다. ▶ 알림 저장 기능 - 미쳐 보지 못한 내웃사에 달린 소중한 댓글알림등이 저장됩니다. ▶ 재가입 기능 - 아이디가 기억나지 않는 웃사인들을 위한 재가입기능 (회원 가입시 이미 가입되어 있는 경우 기존 아이디를 삭제하고 다른 아이디로 재가입 할 수 있어요.) ▶ 닉네임 변경은 하루에 한번만 가능합니다. ▶ 즐겨찾기 저장 기능 - 즐겨찾기를 저장해 두시면 웃사를 삭제해도 복원할 수 있습니다. Always stay connected to the battlefield with the Battlelog app for Android phones and tablets. It contains all the features you need to stay on top of the game. Check your stats, see what’s next to unlock, view the results from your matches, challenge your friends to Missions, customize your Loadout and see how you’re doing in the Geo Leaderboards. Battlelog even connects to Battlefield™ 4 while you’re playing the game! Now you can find the server you want to play on or join a friend directly from the Battlelog app with Remote Joining. You can also customize your Loadout in real-time while you’re playing, and on tablet you can even use BattleScreen to get a fullscreen, real-time minimap of the game you’re playing. You can also connect with friends and the Battlefield™ community. Write updates to your feed, read all the latest news and join other passionate fans in the forums. With Battlelog you will always have the battlefield with you. Battlelog Features: • SOLDIER STATS & PROGRESSION – View the progress and stats of your soldier to see how far you are from your next rank, how many kills you’ve gotten, and which weapon is your best. • LOADOUT – Customize your soldier’s Loadout wherever you are, and you can even update from the app in real-time while you’re playing. • SUGGESTIONS & TRACKING – Get suggestions for new awards and unlocks to pursue, or find that special weapon you’re after and track it so you can follow its progression. • BATTLE REPORTS – View detailed stats of your past games to inspect your strengths and weakness, and share the reports to your feed for extra bragging rights. • MULTIPLAYER & REMOTE JOIN – View and find servers directly in the app, and join your friends or favorite servers remotely when you’re playing. • BATTLESCREEN* - View the minimap in fullscreen and real-time on your tablet, while you’re playing. As squad leader you can even set new orders directly from the app. • LEADERBOARDS – Choose your location and see how you stack up against friends, your city, your country and the world across a wide range of stats. • MISSIONS – Challenge your friends to custom Missions to see who can get the most kills in a round or be the best tank destroyer. • CAMPAIGN – View your campaign progression, check your stats and see how many points you’ve collected compared to your friends. • FORUMS – Share your passion for Battlefield™ with the rest of the community in the forums. • BATTLE FEED – Stay in touch with your friends’ Battlefield™ progression and share your stories with them. • COM CENTER – See when your friends are online and are playing Battlefield™ and get quick access to their profile and stats. • NEWS – Stay up-to-date with the latest Battlefield™ news from anywhere in the world. • PREMIUM – See what releases and drops are coming up for Premium members. Supported Games: • Battlefield™ 4 • Battlefield™ 3 *Tablet app only
release_text: Synced with the latest game data from Battlefield Hardline Fixed bugs reported since the Battlefield Hardline release

description: Record movies silently in background while browsing web pages, playing game, using navigation or even with screen turned off. No one will know that you are recording. Simply press application icon and continue using your phone. Movie will be recorded until application icon is pressed again. Your movie will wait for you in external memory. Record duration in free version is limited to 30 or 60 seconds. Please consider buying PRO version for unlimited recording duration. You can use application as a: ★ Hidden recorder - use your phone as a spy camera and record your surroundings while making a phone call or with disabled screen (no one will notice that recorder is on), ★ Car video camera / dashcam - record your drive while using gps navigation at the same time, ★ Security camera - just leave it in a room, disable screen and record while you are gone. Features: • No preview, • No shutter sound (on most devices), • HD (1080p) recording, • Support for both front and back camera, • Selecting records quality (for longer recordings at the same storage), • Notification icon can be hidden - no one can tell that recorder is on, • Recording for specified duration or until manual stop, • Browsing / deleting movies directly from aplication. Known issues: • In some counties legal obligations will not allow to disable shutter sound, • Some devices will record front camera videos with wrong rotation. It can be easily fixed by changing 'Recording rotation' in options. • If movies are not visible after connecting Nexus 4 or Nexus 7 to the computer phone / tablet has to be restarted to make recordings visible (this is well known problem with those two devices). • Some Samsung devices returns internal memory when asked for 'external memory'. That's why movies are saved there instead of on SD Card. • In any other cases please contact as at hello@lofatsoftware.com . We will do our best to fix a problem as soon as possible. Please be aware that it is your responsibility to use this application with respect to people's privacy and in compliance with the law. Thank you.
release_text: 1. Experimental option for changing movies directory path. It can be used to record movies directly to SD card (in case of device having both internal memory and SD card slot). 2. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) link added in settings.

description: The only complete numerology report. - This is a DEMO version. We provide the most accurate and complete Numerology report. 1. Hidden Passion - represents specific field of expertise, or a concentrated talent 2. Karmic Lesson - Karmic Lessons are areas that we are currently weak in, and that we must face and work on in this life. 3. Excess Number 4. Heart's desire - The Heart's Desire number is just what the name implies: your innermost yearning; the dreams closest to your heart. 5. Inner Dreams - Number sometimes called the Personality Number, your name relates a secret dream, your inner desires, or maybe even fantasies. 6. Expression Number - The Expression number reveals the talents, abilities, and shortcomings that were with you when you entered your human body. 7. The Rational Thought Number - Your Rational Thought number reveals what can probably best be described as the way you think. - Not Available in Demo 8. Family Numbers - You can tell a lot about you and your relatives from the common name you share. The family number represents an important lesson you chose to learn together, and it can be a difficult lesson, until you accept its presence in your lives. - Not Available in Demo 9. Balance Number - People experience different internal responses to life’s challenges. - Not Available in Demo 10. Special Letter - Want to know how someone will react emotionally to surprises or changes in circumstances? - Not Available in Demo 11. Subconscious Self - The Subconscious Self reflects the confidence you have in your personal power and competence, as well as in your ability to deal with sudden events and situations. - Not Available in Demo 12. The Challenge to the Expression - is what must be overcome and done in order for you to express in a positive way. - Not Available in Demo 13. Halo Number - The halo describes those attributes that the name emits in a positive or negative form. - Not Available in Demo 14. Life path - This number represents who you are at birth and the native traits that you will carry with you through life. - Not Available in Demo 15. Your Birthday Number - The day you were born bears great significance in understanding who you are and where your talents lie. The day of birth indicates some special talent you possess. - Not Available in Demo 16. Month Of Birth - Not Available in Demo 17. Year of Birth - Not Available in Demo 18. Maturity Number - Not Available in Demo 19. Personal Year Number - Not Available in Demo 20. Personal Month Number - Not Available in Demo 21. Personal Day Number - Not Available in Demo All these only now at this ridiculous price. The roots of numerology can be traced back some 10,000 years to Egypt and Babylonia. Pythagoras, who developed many of the basic theorems that form the foundation of modern mathematics, is credited with formally organizing the field about 2600 years ago in ancient Greece. At the turn of the 20th century, an American, L. Dow Balliet, along with several contemporaries, initiated the modern phase of numerology. Now, in the 21st century, a marked resurgence of interest in numerology is taking place thanks to an increase in research and publication. Everything in the universe vibrates at its own particular frequency. By finding the vibration rate of any object, you can establish the qualities and energies associated with it. By applying the principles of numerology -- and using only a name and birth date as the basic data -- you can determine the major frequencies of a person. A numerological analysis of the calculated frequencies provides significant information on personality and character. Extra: European, Chinese, Mayan and Egyptian generic zodiac.

Quick Outlook Web Access(OWA Email) for Outlook exchange 2007, and 2010. Will work with ANY exchange accounts. Access your Email, Calendar, and contacts directly and never retype your log in credentials. Images and text are better sized for fingers. Enhancements can be toggled and still use this app for easy access to your OWA email. Most pages display without scrolling left or right, depending on the content. ****Now includes custom signatures. This contains the full functionality of outlook and exchange that is found in the Outlook Web Access online application provided by microsoft. Directory lookup, Emails, Calendars, everything that is available to the OWA interface is available here. Works with outlook exchange 2007 & 2010. OWA 2003: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.outlook2003 **Some OWA log in pages are customized, please contact the developer with any log in issues*** I'm open to feedback on defects and enhancements. QOWA has no agreement or association with the Microsoft corporation. This is an independent application and is no way implied as in partnership or replacement of any Office or Microsoft products.

description: If you are a fan of cute little pony games, here is an awesome jigsaw puzzle for you! Grab some free time for yourself while your young ones are concentrated on putting together the pieces of pictures of miniature horses. The magical horse land of little ponies and unicorns will simply enchant them, but it will also provide them with good quality brain training. Use this opportunity to do some daily chores, while the little ones are playing with your phone. Concentration games develop mind logic and encourage critical thinking because they involve putting related pieces together to form the big puzzle picture. Secondly, in the world of constant stimulation through television and movies, your kid needs some quiet activity when he or she can contemplate and focus attention on a problem solving activity. Thirdly, it will be a great memory test for parents,too, as well as a great family bonding experience. Nowadays, kids learning is made easy with free games for mobile. Even though, as adults, we typically do not think of these brain games as educational, they can actually increase children's ability to think logically through different situations, both in school and out of it. Therefore, you should download this new puzzle maker that will surely evoke your children's interest in beautiful animals such as horses. Aren't ponies so adorable you just want to hug them? Every young child dreams about riding a pony, or at least of having a huge fluffy pony toy. Since they are so little and cute, they have become desirable as pets in our modern culture. They are kept as companions for our children and participate in sport with young equestrians. For these reasons, we have created an amazing pony game that every child will love. Free memory games exercise the child's pattern recognition ability, imagination and creativity. So, what are you waiting for? Get 'Little Pony: Kids Puzzle Games' today and go on a puzzle quest of the year! Once you install them on your phone, mind puzzles become addicting games that are so difficult to put down. Puzzles for kids are meant to keep their mind fit, so, do not waste your time – get this brand new free app from the market and offer your children a pleasant surprise. Download this excellent free puzzle game today and let your kids have an amazing learning experience. If they like cooking games and racing games, they will also love these amazing new games with jigsaw puzzles! Whether you're looking for mobile games for boys or girls, this is an incredible collection of cute pictures. Download it now and enjoy!

description: "The Ultimate One-on-One Artillery Game" – Now with cross-platform ONLINE Play! Pocket Tanks is the fast-paced artillery game that is simple to learn, and fun to master. The perfect quick game for friends and family, you'll find yourself hooked for hours of play! Bury your opponent in a mound of dirt, or assail him with a barrage of bullets. Visit the Weapon Shop before battle to arm yourself for the struggle, or try the Target Practice mode to learn all the weapons and the best tactics to win. Experience the thrill of launching volley after volley of powerful and fun weapons across the battlefield, using very simple controls. Select your angle, power, and FIRE! Your arsenal of unique and useful weapons includes: Napalm, Firecracker, Skipper, Cruiser, Dirt Mover, and dozens more! This is the light-hearted game of heavy artillery for everyone. ----------------------------------- Download Pocket Tanks COMPLETELY FREE, and learn the ropes with 40 exciting weapons. The Free version also includes WiFi AND Online play, to challenge your friends wherever they are. Upgrade in-app to Deluxe and receive: - 100 brand new weapons (140 total with all free packs) - Jump Jets for moving your tank around - Bouncy Dirt for creating reflective terrain - Digger for tunneling your tank underground - Support for weapon expansion packs, both paid and FREE! Plus... Mud Pie Cannon Ball Fission Bomb Popcorn Mega Cruiser Pillow Fight Hot Foot Volcano Pedestal Lightning Strike Gravity Well Funnel Snowballs Collide-o-scope Side Kick Nanobots Warp Gate And a whole lot more! ----------------------------------- Note from the author: I have been writing artillery games since 1993. I created Pocket Tanks in 2001, and thanks to the many loyal fans, it is still in active development to this very day. Please join me in my quest to make Pocket Tanks a classic artillery game that stands the test of time. Thanks to all who have supported BlitWise over the years. -Michael P. Welch Author of DX-Ball & Scorched Tanks Millions of downloads, over a decade of fun! For the PC/Mac versions visit: www.blitwise.com

description: Skydream is an animated 3D live wallpaper. This relaxing, peaceful live wallpaper makes you flying in the sky, among the clouds and the birds, bringing you a feeling of total serenity and freedom. Features: - 4 different backgrounds are available for the sky. - Motion can be controlled using the orientation sensor, the touch screen, or randomly. The motion speed can be defined in the application settings. Requirements: - You must have at least ANDROID 2.1 to run live wallpaper. - This application uses Opengl live wallpaper framework, which is not supported by all android phones (a list of supported devices will be added shortly). To use: Home -> Menu -> Wallpaper -> Live Wallpapers Tags: skydream, live, wallpaper, sky, skybox, clouds, 3D, 360, android, opengl, nice, relaxing, fairy.

Stay on top of your travel plans with EVA Mobile. The perfect companion for business and leisure travelers, this app lets you manage your EVA Air bookings, review your Infinity MileageLands account, and instantly check the status of upcoming flights. 1. Booking a flight - Now you can find a flight and buy your tickets through mobile phones. 2. Flight Info - Browse the EVA Air flight schedule, check the status of departing and arriving flights, and register for SMS notification of actual arrival and departure times. 3. Check in –Check in online and save time.(3 to 24 hrs before departure) 4. My Trip – Sign in to view your booking record, select your seat and check in. 5. Members Area - Check your mileage account, sign up for SMS flight status updates, and check the latest news from the Members Area. 6. Contact Us - You don’t need to search the web to find contact details for your local EVA Air office. All the information you need is just a tap. International users can effortlessly switch between English, Japanese, traditional Chinese and simplified Chinese. EVA Mobile Web: m.evaair.com EVA Air Global Web: www.evaair.com

Islamic Wallpapers free app for Android™ offers you the most beautiful, carefully picked background images that will beautify your phone and show everybody that you are proud to be a Muslim. - If you want to set as wallpaper any of the pictures from this collection, you have to be connected to the Internet to download it to your phone. Once you download the picture you like, it will be saved on your sd card, and after that you don’t need the Internet connection any more. In this collection you will find wonderful Islamic images that are the best examples of Islamic calligraphy and other symbols of Islam adapted to your phone screen size. Enjoy free wallpapers because they show the greatest pieces of Islamic art that is now on your phone. Now your phone is not just a simple means of communication, but it has a deeper meaning for you. It shows your devotion to Islam and to almighty Allah. Islam is a monotheistic and Abrahamic religion articulated by the Quran, a text considered by its adherents to be the verbatim word of God (Arabic: الله‎ Allāh), and by the teachings and normative example (called the Sunnah and composed of Hadith) of Muhammad, considered by them to be the last prophet of God. An adherent of Islam is called a Muslim. Muslims believe that God is one and incomparable and the purpose of existence is to love and serve God. Muslims also believe that Islam is the complete and universal version of a primordial faith that was revealed at many times and places before, including through Abraham, Moses and Jesus, whom they consider prophets. They maintain that previous messages and revelations have been partially changed or corrupted over time, but consider the Quran to be both the unaltered and the final revelation of God. Religious concepts and practices include the five pillars of Islam (Sawm, Salah, Shahadah, Zakah and Hajj), which are basic concepts and obligatory acts of worship. Features of Islamic Wallpapers app: - App 2 SD card support. - Share app on Facebook, Twitter, send by bluetooth, send by gmail, save to Dropbox and more. - Free and always will be Download best wallpapers for your phone and imagine you are every day in Mecca, the birthplace of the Prophet Muhammad. description: This is a scary slotmachine.

How long can you last? Explore dark dungeons and hack and slash your way to treasure through hordes of bloodthirsty monsters eager to eat you for lunch! Dungelot 2 is a remarkably simple and engaging roguelike. Develop your character, find and upgrade equipment, hunt for treasure and useful items, and, above all, survive. Features: Perfect for quick breaks and brief play sessions. Dungeon dives last 5-10 minutes Endless gameplay No two adventures are ever the same! Dungeons are randomly generated for each new character. Unique gameplay experience: Simple controls and a fresh perspective on the RPG Battles with deadly dungeon lords: Loot new artifacts from bosses and show 'em what you're made of! Survive for as long as you can! Avoid traps, evade enemies, and use your character's spells and special abilities to stay alive!

This plugin automatically locks your device when receiving a SMS* containing a defined keyword. If you lost your phone, you can prevent others from accessing your private data by simply sending a SMS to your phone. This is just a plugin and requires the "Delayed Lock" app version 2.0.8 or newer to run!! To configure the plugin, open "Delayed Lock" and scroll down to the plugins section. * the app just looks for SMS - no MMS, no Google Voice SMS, no Whatsapp or whatsoever

description: ✪✪✪ Listen to the best Internet Radios. Record Music as MP3 for free. ✪✪✪ Audials is a radio player and recorder with over 80,000 radio stations! Including most wanted stations of the East Coast, Midwest, South and West Coast like Z-100, VirtualDJ Radio, Hot 97, Hard Radio, Radio Caraibes, The Beat LA, Undergroundradio, Kiss FM, Radio Kiskeya, ABC, RadioMargaritaville, Christian Pirate Radio, Onada Cero, Black Gospel Network and Radio Vision 2000. Just record with a single click your favorite music directly and in best quality from radio! ✪ Find the Best Radio station for your Music ✪ Simply enter your favorite artists or select a music genre, country or a local station near you. Audials Radio App will find the Internet radios for you. 80,000 radios with MP3- or AAC-Audio streams are included. ✪ Wake Up with your Favourite Internet Radio Station ✪ Audials app will wake you up on time with the music of your favourite Internet radio. Including Snooze function! A sleep timer is included as well. ✪ Your Radio Recorder ✪ Just click the “Record” button to save music played by the web radio. With the history you can play back your favorite songs at any time again and again. ✪ Fast Zapping between Radio Stations ✪ Enter a desired radio station or an artist and zap quickly to find one that best matches your music taste. Finding new web radios has never been this easy! ✪ Stream to Airplay and Chromecast ✪ Audials is the one and only app for android, which can stream music to airplay receivers. Also Chromcast is supported. ✪ Equalizer ✪ Adapt the sound for every amplifying system or headphone. ✪ SD-Memory Card and Cloud Manager ✪ You can work easily with Clouds and move your music files from/to your SD-Card. ✪ Wireless Music Syncing ✪ Audials Anywhere connects your smartphone to your computer at home, letting you enjoy your music and media collection no matter where you are. Please join the testers group if you want to help us making Audials Radio app better: Beta-Group (could contain minor bugs): https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/107610129454168959709 Alpha-Group (even more unstable): https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/100958471322126329381
